${ModID}:Vindicate.NAME: Vindicate
${ModID}:Vindicate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play an Attack this turn, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:DarkLance.NAME: Dark Lance
${ModID}:DarkLance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you've changed Stances this turn, draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:FuriousAssault.NAME: Furious Assault
${ModID}:FuriousAssault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Enter ${ModID}:Aggression. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Slam.NAME: Slam
${ModID}:Slam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:Decapitate.NAME: Decapitate
${ModID}:Decapitate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Epiphany.NAME: Epiphany
${ModID}:Epiphany.DESCRIPTION: If you are in ${ModID}:Aggression, exit it and draw !M! cards. NL Otherwise, enter ${ModID}:Aggression.

${ModID}:InnerFury.NAME: Inner Fury
${ModID}:InnerFury.DESCRIPTION: When you enter ${ModID}:Aggression, gain !M! temporary Strength and !M! Block. NL Enter ${ModID}:Aggression.

${ModID}:LunaticRage.NAME: Lunatic Rage
${ModID}:LunaticRage.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [E] [E] . NL Discard all non-Attack non-Status cards. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Animosity.NAME: Animosity
${ModID}:Animosity.DESCRIPTION: When you enter, exit, or start your turn in ${ModID}:Aggression, gain !M! Strength.
